attributes.action: abolish the post and function of the party whip.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The post of “Whip” is to get all MP’s of a political “Party” to vote for/against a policy being pushed through in parliament. A 3 line whip is a strict instruction to attend and vote in a particular way or suffer the consequences! This is not democratic and may not be the view of the “people” the MP’s are elected to parliament to represent.

MP’s should be allowed to vote how the constituents want, not to “toe” the party line. A similar result can be achieved by simply changing the rules to make all MP’s attend a vote and not allowing party politics to interfere and let the elected representative’s vote how the “People” want!

Abolish this nonsense.

Is that not democratic?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
